9c8e4b25-debb-4419-aad6-1b67c99fb084.description: Earners of the HashiCorp Certified: Terraform Associate certification know the basic concepts, skills, and use cases associated with open source HashiCorp Terraform. They understand and can utilize Terraform according to the certification objectives. Additionally, they understand why enterprises choose to extend Terraform Open Source with Terraform Enterprise to solve business critical objectives.
9c8e4b25-debb-4419-aad6-1b67c99fb084.name: HashiCorp Certified: Terraform Associate (002)

badge_template_activities.title: Score a passing grade on the HashiCorp Certified: Terraform Associate multiple choice exam

943f2ef0-849b-4563-9293-5168052e1b64.description: Earners of the HashiCorp Certified: Vault Associate certification know the basic concepts, skills, and use cases associated with open source HashiCorp Vault. They understand and can utilize Vault according to the certification objectives. Additionally, they understand why enterprises choose to extend Vault Open Source with Vault Enterprise to solve business critical objectives.
943f2ef0-849b-4563-9293-5168052e1b64.name: HashiCorp Certified: Vault Associate (002)

badge_template_activities.title: Score a passing grade on the HashiCorp Certified: Vault Associate multiple choice exam

67030bae-8484-4eb5-9837-7071cc932ff7.description: Earners of the HashiCorp Certified: Consul Associate certification know the basic concepts and skills to build, secure, and maintain open source HashiCorp Consul. They understand and can utilize Consul according to the certification objectives. Additionally, they understand why enterprises choose to extend Consul Open Source with Consul Enterprise to solve business critical objectives.
67030bae-8484-4eb5-9837-7071cc932ff7.name: HashiCorp Certified: Consul Associate (002)

badge_template_activities.title: Score a passing grade on the HashiCorp Certified: Consul Associate multiple choice exam

35bddf8e-0dff-466e-8a6f-ec83142d4b4d.description: HashiCorp partner practitioners who achieve Terraform CHIP certification have proven that they understand how to deploy and maintain Terraform Enterprise in a production customer environment and they understand the differentiation between Terraform offerings of Open Source, Terraform Cloud SaaS, and Terraform Enterprise for private deployment. This certification also confirms that the holder successfully completed the 3-day CHIP hands-on training exclusive to HashiCorp SI partners.
35bddf8e-0dff-466e-8a6f-ec83142d4b4d.name: Terraform: Certified HashiCorp Implementation Partner (CHIP)

badge_template_activities.title: HashiCorp partners who achieve CHIP certification have participated in and successfully completed the 3-day hands-on training from the HashiCorp partner team.

e240660a-82f7-49db-b1cf-8cce6c754028.description: HashiCorp partner practitioners who achieve Vault CHIP certification have proven that they understand how to deploy and maintain Vault Enterprise in a production customer environment and they understand the differentiation between Vault offerings of Open Source and Enterprise for private deployment. This certification also confirms that the holder successfully completed the 3-day CHIP hands-on training exclusive to HashiCorp SI partners.
e240660a-82f7-49db-b1cf-8cce6c754028.name: Vault: Certified HashiCorp Implementation Partner (CHIP)

badge_template_activities.title: HashiCorp partners who achieve CHIP certification have participated in and successfully completed the 3-day hands-on training from the HashiCorp partner team.

342d01c1-a311-4580-a44a-33714cdc3e92.description: HashiCorp Ambassadors are individuals who are committed to the spirit of open source. They actively share knowledge about HashiCorp tools through content creation, local events and productive, thoughtful feedback, while advocating and adhering to the HashiCorp Principles. Ambassadors support growth and accessibility of the community, focusing on three key elements: Knowledge sharing, Mentorship and Kindness.
342d01c1-a311-4580-a44a-33714cdc3e92.name: HashiCorp Ambassador 2023

badge_template_activities.title: Ambassadors are nominated or apply to be selected for recognition of active efforts around HashiCorp tools during the twelve months preceding participation.

38e02fc6-fcf7-48a8-b431-8868f54f375f.description: The Vault Operations Professional exam is for Cloud Engineers focused on deploying, configuring, managing, and monitoring a production Vault environment. The exam includes a mix of hands-on tasks performed in a lab, and multiple-choice questions. Certification holders have proven they have the skills, knowledge, and competency to perform the Vault operational tasks listed in the objectives.
38e02fc6-fcf7-48a8-b431-8868f54f375f.name: HashiCorp Certified: Vault Operations Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Score a passing grade on the HashiCorp Certified: Vault Operations Professional Exam

be5fa952-2ed3-4aa3-916a-f13890897de9.description: HashiCorp Core Contributors are individuals who are committed to the spirit of open source. They actively contribute to HashiCorp's open source tools through submission of pull requests, issues and bugs, and / or contribution to documentation, while advocating and adhering to the HashiCorp Principles.
be5fa952-2ed3-4aa3-916a-f13890897de9.name: HashiCorp Core Contributor 2022

badge_template_activities.title: Core Contributors are nominated to be selected for recognition of contributions to HashiCorp's open source tools during the twelve months preceding participation.

998657dd-0673-4720-ba1a-6972defdde03.description: HashiCorp Core Contributors are individuals who are committed to the spirit of open source. eaffb192-4116-4431-9f99-25f51a5b54be.description: Earners of the HashiCorp Certified: Vault Operations Professional Exam Contributor certification have contributed significantly to building and maintaining HashiCorp's Vault Operations Professional exam.
eaffb192-4116-4431-9f99-25f51a5b54be.name: HashiCorp Certified: Vault Operations Professional Exam Contributor

badge_template_activities.title: Wrote at least 5 accepted questions for the exams OR Attended and participated in at least 10 working sessions OR Substantially contributed to the role scope, scenarios, or exam design.

a5490634-708b-4644-83ec-3428bdbaccd8.description: Earners of the HashiCorp Certified: Vault Associate Exam Contributor certification have contributed significantly to building the HashiCorp Vault Associate exam. These subject matter experts are the cloud engineers who helped build and maintain this exam.
a5490634-708b-4644-83ec-3428bdbaccd8.name: HashiCorp Certified: Vault Associate Exam Contributor

badge_template_activities.title: This person has completed one or more of the following: 1) Has written at least 10 accepted questions, 2) Has reviewed at least 20 questions, and 3) Was a significant contributor to the exam role scope

0798e6a9-bf05-4553-b264-c71931cda0a8.description: HashiCorp Authorized Instructors are experienced DevOps professionals who deliver official HashiCorp training courses in person and virtually. Each partner (and instructor) goes through a certification process to verify their level of expertise and ability to deliver the most relevant and practical training to enterprise customers and open source practitioners.
0798e6a9-bf05-4553-b264-c71931cda0a8.name: Terraform: Authorized HashiCorp Instructor

badge_template_activities.title: This person has independently delivered a HashiCorp Enterprise Academy training course.
